Hello,
I am Gauri Prajapat. I am 22 year old Freelance model and Actor. I began modelling at the age of 21 as a part time job while I was pursuing my bachelor's in Engineering. I enjoy exploring different forms of art like dance, music and painting. I prefer to go for new concepts and ideas. I am an animal activist and work for an NGO named AWARE based in Indore.
